about_the_game:
a realm where the veil between the mundane and the mystical is but a whisper in the wind. This world, is a land steeped in ancient magic and inhabited by a myriad of mythical creatures. From the towering peaks to the shadowed depths, every corner teems with life—both wondrous and terrifying.

The winds of fate stir as the young hero GAI steps forth, his heart brimming with courage and a thirst for adventure. Though small in stature, GAI possesses a spirit as boundless as the skies above . By his side stand his loyal companions, each as unique and formidable as the lands they hail from.

Together, this unlikely band of heroes embarks on a quest that will take them to the farthest reaches. From battling fearsome beasts to uncovering ancient secrets, GAI and his companions will face challenges that test their strength, resolve, and the bonds of friendship that hold them together.
